name: return-youtube-dislike
description: Chrome extension to return youtube dislikes

scripts.start: echo To build for development, please use "npm run dev". To build for production, please use "npm run build".
scripts.build:safari: webpack --mode=production && xcrun safari-web-extension-converter Extensions/combined/dist/safari --project-location Extensions/combined/dist --bundle-identifier com.returnyoutubedislike.safari-ext --force

author: Anarios
